Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
ObjectRegistrationMeta data for ObjectRegisterFunction. Used for attribute callbacks
pAttributePostObjectMeta data for attributes callbacks when the scene is playing.
Virtools is not initializing the attributes parameter correctly
pAxisReferencedLengthHelp info to specify a length by an entity reference
pBrokenJointEntryMeta info to track a broken joint from a NX-SDK callback to the next frame
pCapsuleSettingsAdditional settings to override a default capsule
pCapsuleSettingsExAdditional settings to override a default capsule
pCCDSettingsClass for describing rigid bodies ccd settings
pCloth
pClothDescDescriptor class for pCloth
pCollisionSettingsClass for describing rigid bodies or its sub shapes collisions settings
pConvexCylinderSettingsOptional override to describe a convex cylinder
pDeformableSettingsAdditional information for deformable objects
pDominanceSetupItemDominance setup for the scene
pFactorySingleton class to create physic objects
pFluidThe fluid class represents the main module for the particle based fluid simulation. SPH (Smoothed Particle Hydrodynamics) is used to animate the particles
pFluidDesc2 Describes an pFluidDesc
pFluidEmitterThe fluid emitter class. It represents an emitter (fluid source) which is associated with one fluid
pFluidEmitterDescDescriptor for pFluidEmitter class. Used for saving and loading the emitter state
pGroupsMask128-bit mask used for collision filtering
PhysicManagerPhysicManager is a Virtools manager and acts as singleton object
pJD6DriveClass used to describe drive properties for a pJointD6
pJD6SoftLimitDescribes a joint soft limit for D6 usage. pJD6SoftLimit is registered as custom structure pJD6SLimit and can be accessed or modified through parameter operations.
pJointAbstract base class for the different types of joints
pJointBallA sphere joint constrains two points on two bodies to coincide
pJointCylindricalCylindrical Joints permit relative translational movement between two bodies along an axis, and also relative rotation along the axis
pJointD6A D6 joint is a general constraint between two actors
pJointDistanceA distance joint maintains a certain distance between two points on two bodies
pJointLimitDescribes a joint limit. pJointLimit is registered as custom structure pJLimit and can be accessed or modified through parameter operations.
pJointPointInPlaneA point in plane joint constrains a point on one actor to only move inside a plane attached to another actor. The point attached to the plane is defined by the anchor point. The joint's axis specifies the plane normal
pJointPointOnLineA point on line joint constrains a point on one actor to only move along a line attached to another actor. The point attached to the line is the anchor point for the joint. The line through this point is specified by its direction (axis) vector
pJointPrismaticA prismatic joint permits relative translational movement between two bodies along an axis, but no relative rotational movement
pJointPulleyA pulley joint simulates a rope between two objects passing over 2 pulleys
pJointRevoluteA joint which behaves in a similar way to a hinge or axle
pMassSettingsClass describing a rigid bodies mass offset
pMaterialClass for describing a shape's surface properties
pMotorDescribes a joint motor. Some joints can be motorized, this allows them to apply a force to cause attached actors to move. Joints which can be motorized: pJointPulley pJointRevolute is used for a similar purpose with pJointD6
pObjectDescrDescribes a rigid body
pOptimizationClass for describing rigid bodies optimization
pPivotSettingsClass to describe a pivot offset
pRigidBodyPRigidBody is the main simulation object in the physics SDK
pSerializerClass to import and export NxStream files. Those files can be created by 3D related content editors such as Maya and 3D-SMax. Also, you can dump the entire Virtools scene and load it in the supplied PhysX Viewer
pSpringDescribes a joint spring. The spring is implicitly integrated, so even high spring and damper coefficients should be robust. pSpring is registered as custom structure pJSpring and can be accessed or modified through parameter operations.
pSubMeshInfoMeta data to track the relation between a NxShape and an CK3dEntity. Also used to track a wheel object in the NxShapes user data
pTireFunctionCubic hermit spline coefficients describing the longitudinal tire force curve
pVehicleGearsA abstract base class for a vehicle gear box
pWheelBase class to handle a vehicle wheel
pWheelContactDataContact information used by pWheel
pWheelContactModifyAn interface class that the user can implement in order to modify the contact point on which the WheelShape base its simulation constraints
pWorldClass to maintain physical objects
